text: Hey dude! Great seeing a babe like you in the sand… we should hang out.
You wanna catch some waves with me? The tide is high and I brought my surfboard!
I'm totally down to help you hang and catch some waves! Sounds like a great afternoon.
Oh… well I'd guess we'd better head over soon then!

But you're at the beach! It's okay though, 
 I'm sure I can show you just how charming the ocean can be.

By the way, what brings you to the beach? 
 I don't see houses like you here often… I guess it's just my lucky day!

Gnarly, dude! I haven't met someone like you before… 
 it's like drinking water when it's 106 F!
I hope I can see you again. You're the kind of house you meet once and never forget.
Well dude… I'm glad you like the view! I think the scenery is even better though.
I hope I'll see you around! We should catch some waves sometime.
You know what dude? Good for you, the air is real fresh out here.

It's tough you didn't seem to love the beach… 
 I'll catch some waves with you next time.
